topic: Live updates: Australia face India in third T20, scores and commentary

ideas.title: Drop Everything!
ideas.premise: A frazzled Melburnian, late for a tram, drops their coffee, phone, and a meat pie to catch a crucial six on a giant outdoor screen showing the T20.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable chaos of Melbourne life meets passionate cricket fandom.

ideas.title: Commentary Karaoke
ideas.premise: A group of bogans in a Collingwood pub attempts to perfectly lip-sync the live cricket commentary, turning it into an aggressive, shouting karaoke session.
ideas.why_funny: Pokes fun at Aussie pub culture and exaggerated sports enthusiasm.

ideas.title: The G's New View
ideas.premise: A bewildered family visiting the MCG for the first time accidentally stumbles into a T20 match after thinking they'd booked a tour, expressing shock at the noise and coloured clothing.
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes the iconic ground with the often-loud spectacle of T20 cricket.

ideas.title: Streaming Struggle
ideas.premise: A cartoon showing buffering symbols on every device in a Fitzroy house, while the neighbours celebrate a wicket â€“ highlighting Melbourne's sometimes-dodgy internet during big sporting events.
ideas.why_funny: Australians know the struggle of streaming sports.

ideas.title: Heritage Bank Heist
ideas.premise: Two robbers attempting to rob a 'Heritage Bank' get distracted by the T20 score playing on the bank's TV, completely forgetting their criminal intentions.
ideas.why_funny: Plays on the named sponsor and the intensity of the game.
